short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to the compose window in Gmail that will automatically Boomerang messages based on your chosen settings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding to the power of the amazing Boomerang for Gmail plugin, Auto Follow Up enables power users to immediately follow up on emails without having to manually enable it and/or set a date. Auto Follow Up is ideal for the outreach maven who wants to shave a few seconds off of their process.
